abstract.para: Use the ansible.cfg file to adjust certain settings. The standard configuration is usually sufficient for most users. Ansible's behavior can also be configured in environment variables, command-line options and playbook keywords.

topic.para: The ansible-config utility provides users with a comprehensive view of all available configuration settings, including their default values, instructions on how to set them and the origin of their current values. Ansible processes the following list and uses the first file found, all others are ignored.

listitem.para: ansible.cfg located in the current directory.
